rewards.description:
Marbles on Stream is the most welcoming stream interactive experience where a streamer can run the game and welcome anyone in their chat to participate with "!play". That's it!

Join in for exclusive prizes and keep an eye on our for how we evolve this event in the future. If you need assistance please join our discord. Discord.gg/pixelbypixelstudios

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online- January 2

rewards.description: ABI Season 4 is now live and blazing! To celebrate the new season launch and in response to popular demand, we are bringing back 9 streamer stickers from the NS1-S3. Viewers will be rewarded for gifting subscriptions to these eligible streamers in the Arena Breakout: Infinite (ABI) category: ImOw, GL40LabsRaT, HITBOXKING, Arven93, LVNDMARK, QuattroAce, Kritikal, BakedJake, Ralisco. Support your favorite eligible streamers and receive the exclusive Stickers! Note that Viewers who had claimed any of these streamer stickers before S4 cannot re-claim the same stickers this time, and subscriptions will only count toward the event task if gifted while the streamer is live and broadcasting ABI content. Event Page: https://www.arenabreakoutinfinite.com/twitchdrops
rewards.name: S4 Support ABI Streamers

rewards.description: ABI Season 4 is now live and blazing! To celebrate the new season launch, we’re bringing you a limited-time Twitch Drops event! Watch Arena Breakout: Infinite content with enabled Twitch Drops to unlock up to 6 rewards! The longer you watch, the better the rewards get! Please link your Level Infinite Pass account and Twitch Account on the event page (https://www.arenabreakoutinfinite.com/twitchdrops ), and claim your Drops rewards in time. Note that viewers who had claimed MoreFun 15th Anniv. Set in S3 cannot re-claim the set again.

rewards.description:
Celebrate the full Gold Master release of Eldegarde with us.
Watch one of the participating channels and earn rewards ranging from health potions and bandages, to a random weapon, and more. We hope you enjoy the new class, new map, and the fresh season start.

To claim the reward, you have to link your Twitch account with your game account by clicking the Twitch Rewards button on the Adventure tab.
rewards.name: Eldegarde: Gold Master

rewards.description: 2XKO is a free 2v2 fighting game featuring the iconic champions from League of Legends. To celebrate the launch of the game on January 20, we're kicking off a special Twitch Drop campaign featuring two exclusive in-game rewards: the exclusive "LIVE NOW" Player Title and the "PRIVATE LOBBY" Player Card. Fans can earn both by watching participating streamers from the 2XKO creator community as they queue up and join the fight. Just link your game account to Twitch, tune in during the campaign, and claim your rewards to get in on the action.
rewards.name: 2XKO Season 1 Launch

rewards.description: If you are looking to get additional competitive points so you can get your next Galactic Competitive Weapon, look no further! Celebrate the end of Season 20 and our Drives Event with Competitive Point drops by watching any of your favorite Overwatch 2 creators.

rewards.description: Каждую неделю за 60 минут просмотра — получайте уникальный «Малый набор», где гарантированно лежит 1 корабельного премиум аккаунта, а также одна из наград:  • 250 штурманских жетонов; • 1000 ед. золота; • Контейнер «Ремонтный»; • Эсминец VIII Cossack; • Крейсер IX Carnot; • Линкор IX Patagonia.  + Особый командир Eva Valentine с 10 очками навыков — единоразовая награда на аккаунт. Жмите «Отслеживать» и получайте награду!

rewards.description: 觀看參與 Twitch Drops 的《RO 仙境傳說：世界之旅》頻道，即可在觀看過程中解鎖遊戲內獎勵。  成功綁定遊戲帳號與 Twitch 帳號後，觀看直播達到指定時長，可依序獲得多階段獎勵，內容包含冒險過程中可使用的實用道具與成長輔助資源。  獎勵將於達成條件後自動發放至遊戲內信箱。 活動期間加入亦可完整參與並獲得所有獎勵。
rewards.name: RO世界正式上市！
